plot: Vehement over racial injustice, the rage of Melinda's latest ghost sets a storm over Grandview (thunder and lightning on clear days) till an honored judge can be set right on the facts of a case he once waved aside.

Melinda must help the ghost of an African-American man who had been attacked and killed by a white co-worker in the 1970's. The ghost haunts the former prosecutor, now judge, who had enough evidence but still failed to file charges against the white co-worker. Melinda tries to help the ghost find justice and help his son to change his racist views before they're passed on to the next generation.—Abakusek
